content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":252292,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アニスが私も・・と出て行こうとするが、止めます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Anise tries to say \"Me too...\" and go out, but I stop her."},{"lineNumber":252293,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は我々が押しています、戦場では魔軍より我が軍の方が多い地域もあります。","translatedEnglishLine":"We have the upper hand now; there are even areas on the battlefield where our forces outnumber the demon army."},{"lineNumber":252294,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それが何か？","translatedEnglishLine":"So what if that's the case?"},{"lineNumber":252295,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ですから、あなたは出せないのです","translatedEnglishLine":"That's why you cannot be sent out."},{"lineNumber":252296,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よくわかりません。じゃ、カレー作ってきます","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't quite understand. Well then, I'll go make some curry."},{"lineNumber":252297,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスさんが魔人を倒してくれたおかげである程度、均衡は保てたとはいえ","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to you, Rance, defeating the demon lord, we've been able to maintain some balance, at least to a degree."},{"lineNumber":252298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　決め手にかけますね。","translatedEnglishLine":"But we're still lacking a decisive edge."},{"lineNumber":252299,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼス全土をすぐ取り戻したい気持ちは分かりますが、慎重に戦いましょう。","translatedEnglishLine":"I understand the desire to reclaim all of Zeth immediately, but let's fight carefully."},{"lineNumber":252300,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いずれチャンスは来ます","translatedEnglishLine":"The opportunity will come eventually."},{"lineNumber":252301,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス首都、ラグナロックアーク","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth Capital, Ragnarock Arc."},{"lineNumber":252302,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが魔人討伐隊を率いて現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance appeared leading the demon extermination squad."},{"lineNumber":252303,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックと会話、元気していたかーしん","translatedEnglishLine":"Talking with Magic, \"How have you been?\""},{"lineNumber":252304,"originalJapaneseLine":"簡単な状況説明","translatedEnglishLine":"A brief explanation of the situation."},{"lineNumber":252305,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサ、ガルティアは倒したが、まだ魔物大将軍ツォトン他の魔軍がいる","translatedEnglishLine":"Medusa and Galtia have been defeated, but the demon general Tsoton and other demon forces still remain."},{"lineNumber":252306,"originalJapaneseLine":"首都を奪いかえす事は出来たが、まだ予断を許さない状況","translatedEnglishLine":"Although we've been able to reclaim the capital, the situation is still precarious."},{"lineNumber":252307,"originalJapaneseLine":"この魔物大将軍ツォトンさえ倒せば、この方面の魔軍は崩壊する","translatedEnglishLine":"If we can just defeat this demon general Tsoton, the demon army in this area will collapse."},{"lineNumber":252308,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとか倒したいのだすが、ツォトンの場所が分からない","translatedEnglishLine":"We want to defeat him somehow, but we don't know Tsoton's location."},{"lineNumber":252309,"originalJapaneseLine":"後方で隠れている訳でなく、最前線に出てくる事も多いが常に移動しているので掴みきれない","translatedEnglishLine":"He doesn't hide in the rear, often appearing on the front lines, but he is constantly moving, so we can't pin him down."},{"lineNumber":252310,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、３カ所ほど候補地が判明しているが・・　地図でその場所を見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"Currently, three possible locations have been identified... Showing those places on the map."},{"lineNumber":252311,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのどれかかもしれないが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It might be any one of those..."},{"lineNumber":252312,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、せっかく来たのだし、俺様が退治してやろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, since I've come all this way, I'll take care of him myself."},{"lineNumber":252313,"originalJapaneseLine":"無事に退治して戻って来たら、魔法使いの可愛い娘を４．５人処女頼む","translatedEnglishLine":"If I return safely after defeating him, I'll want 4 or 5 cute virgin sorceress girls."},{"lineNumber":252314,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにいっているのよー","translatedEnglishLine":"What are you saying—!"},{"lineNumber":252315,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは、今夜は・・お前だとマジックをひっぱって部屋に入る","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahaha, tonight... it's you! He grabs Magic and drags her into the room."},{"lineNumber":252316,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞夜へ","translatedEnglishLine":"> To night"},{"lineNumber":252317,"originalJapaneseLine":"客室、夜","translatedEnglishLine":"Guest room, night."},{"lineNumber":252318,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックとエッチした後、まったり中","translatedEnglishLine":"Relaxing after having sex with Magic."},{"lineNumber":252319,"originalJapaneseLine":"ところでゼスに来ている敵の総大将・・えーと","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, the enemy's supreme commander here in Zeth... um..."},{"lineNumber":252320,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ツォトンのゼス側が知る情報","translatedEnglishLine":"Information known by Zeth about the demon general Tsoton."},{"lineNumber":252321,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たまに前線に現れる、無茶苦茶強い。魔法耐性が高い模様","translatedEnglishLine":"He occasionally appears on the front lines and is ridiculously strong. He seems to have high magic resistance."},{"lineNumber":252322,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アニスの黒色を受けて生きていた、ダメージは受けていたので倒せない事はない","translatedEnglishLine":"He survived Anise's 'Blackness,' and although he took damage, he's not invincible."},{"lineNumber":252323,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他の地域では魔軍の支配地になった村や町はひどい惨殺にあっていると聞くけど","translatedEnglishLine":"I've heard that in other regions, villages and towns under demon army control suffer terrible massacres."},{"lineNumber":252324,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こちらではそんな話はあまり聞かない、それども沢山殺されているけど","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, we don't hear much of that, though many are still killed."},{"lineNumber":252325,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ツォトンはもしかして１番マシなのかも・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe Tsoton is the 'least bad' of them all..."},{"lineNumber":252326,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただ、支配化の地域では試験などをして優秀な人達が魔軍に連れ去られていると聞くわ","translatedEnglishLine":"However, I've heard that in controlled areas, talented people are taken by the demon army through experiments and such."},{"lineNumber":252327,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だいたいそれが２割くらいの人数らしい","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems that's about 20% of the population."},{"lineNumber":252328,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物将軍の頭脳として中に人間を飼っているからそれようかなと思ったがあまりにも多い","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought it might be because the demon general keeps humans inside as brains, but that's too many."},{"lineNumber":252329,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふーん","translatedEnglishLine":"I see."},{"lineNumber":252330,"originalJapaneseLine":"朝になった・・が、暗い","translatedEnglishLine":"Morning came... but it's dark."},{"lineNumber":252331,"originalJapaneseLine":"設定","translatedEnglishLine":"Setting."},{"lineNumber":252332,"originalJapaneseLine":"　光蝕-コウショク-","translatedEnglishLine":"—Koushoku (Light Eclipse)—"},{"lineNumber":252333,"originalJapaneseLine":"　１５日の木曜、友引の日が重なった時に起こる不思議な現象","translatedEnglishLine":"A mysterious phenomenon that occurs when Thursday the 15th coincides with Tomobiki day."},{"lineNumber":252334,"originalJapaneseLine":"　朝になっても日が昇らず、真っ暗のまま。","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though it's morning, the sun doesn't rise and it remains pitch dark."},{"lineNumber":252335,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そしてついには星の光も消えて完全な暗闇になる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Eventually, even starlight disappears, plunging everything into complete darkness."},{"lineNumber":252336,"originalJapaneseLine":"　昼頃には元に戻るのだが、よく分からない不思議な日です。","translatedEnglishLine":"By around noon, things return to normal, but it's a mysterious day that no one fully understands."},{"lineNumber":252337,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが説明、ランスも光蝕自体は知っているので、そうか今日なのかという感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone explains it; Rance knows about the Light Eclipse itself and thinks, 'So it's today, huh'."},{"lineNumber":252338,"originalJapaneseLine":"こういう日ですから、魔軍も動かないと思います。動くとしても昼からですし","translatedEnglishLine":"Because it's such a day, I don't think the demon army will move. Even if they do, it'll be from noon on."},{"lineNumber":252339,"originalJapaneseLine":"出発を遅らせませんか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall we delay our departure?"},{"lineNumber":252340,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、これは面白い、むしろチャンス、いこう。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, this is interesting—rather a chance. Let's go."},{"lineNumber":252341,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図で大将軍ツォトンがいると思われる場所を確認、魔軍エリアに適当に出して下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Check on the map the locations where General Tsoton is believed to be. Please place us appropriately in the demon army area."},{"lineNumber":252342,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ナガールモール周辺","translatedEnglishLine":"- Around Nagaar Mall"},{"lineNumber":252343,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　スリミド周辺","translatedEnglishLine":"- Around Surimido"},{"lineNumber":252344,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　イタリア周辺","translatedEnglishLine":"- Around Italia"},{"lineNumber":252345,"originalJapaneseLine":"このどこかと思われます、どうしますか？","translatedEnglishLine":"It's thought to be one of these. What will you do?"},{"lineNumber":252346,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Select"},{"lineNumber":252347,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　ナガールモール周辺に向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"> Head to the area around Nagaar Mall"},{"lineNumber":252348,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　スリミド周辺に向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"> Head to the area around Surimido"},{"lineNumber":252349,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　イタリア周辺に向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"> Head to the area around Italia"},{"lineNumber":252350,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜／星空","translatedEnglishLine":"Night / starry sky"},{"lineNumber":252351,"originalJapaneseLine":"目的地についたランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance arrived at the destination."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスが私も・・と出て行こうとするが、止めます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anise tries to say "Me too..." and go out, but I stop her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は我々が押しています、戦場では魔軍より我が軍の方が多い地域もあります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have the upper hand now; there are even areas on the battlefield where our forces outnumber the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが何か？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So what if that's the case?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですから、あなたは出せないのです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why you cannot be sent out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくわかりません。じゃ、カレー作ってきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't quite understand. Well then, I'll go make some curry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさんが魔人を倒してくれたおかげである程度、均衡は保てたとはいえ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to you, Rance, defeating the demon lord, we've been able to maintain some balance, at least to a degree.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決め手にかけますね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we're still lacking a decisive edge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス全土をすぐ取り戻したい気持ちは分かりますが、慎重に戦いましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand the desire to reclaim all of Zeth immediately, but let's fight carefully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いずれチャンスは来ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The opportunity will come eventually.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス首都、ラグナロックアーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth Capital, Ragnarock Arc.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが魔人討伐隊を率いて現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance appeared leading the demon extermination squad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックと会話、元気していたかーしん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talking with Magic, "How have you been?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡単な状況説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A brief explanation of the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサ、ガルティアは倒したが、まだ魔物大将軍ツォトン他の魔軍がいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa and Galtia have been defeated, but the demon general Tsoton and other demon forces still remain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都を奪いかえす事は出来たが、まだ予断を許さない状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although we've been able to reclaim the capital, the situation is still precarious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この魔物大将軍ツォトンさえ倒せば、この方面の魔軍は崩壊する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we can just defeat this demon general Tsoton, the demon army in this area will collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか倒したいのだすが、ツォトンの場所が分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want to defeat him somehow, but we don't know Tsoton's location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後方で隠れている訳でなく、最前線に出てくる事も多いが常に移動しているので掴みきれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He doesn't hide in the rear, often appearing on the front lines, but he is constantly moving, so we can't pin him down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、３カ所ほど候補地が判明しているが・・　地図でその場所を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, three possible locations have been identified... Showing those places on the map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのどれかかもしれないが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might be any one of those...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、せっかく来たのだし、俺様が退治してやろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, since I've come all this way, I'll take care of him myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無事に退治して戻って来たら、魔法使いの可愛い娘を４．５人処女頼む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I return safely after defeating him, I'll want 4 or 5 cute virgin sorceress girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにいっているのよー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you saying—!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、今夜は・・お前だとマジックをひっぱって部屋に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, tonight... it's you! He grabs Magic and drags her into the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞夜へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > To night

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 客室、夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guest room, night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックとエッチした後、まったり中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Relaxing after having sex with Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ところでゼスに来ている敵の総大将・・えーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, the enemy's supreme commander here in Zeth... um...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトンのゼス側が知る情報
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information known by Zeth about the demon general Tsoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまに前線に現れる、無茶苦茶強い。魔法耐性が高い模様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He occasionally appears on the front lines and is ridiculously strong. He seems to have high magic resistance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスの黒色を受けて生きていた、ダメージは受けていたので倒せない事はない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He survived Anise's 'Blackness,' and although he took damage, he's not invincible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の地域では魔軍の支配地になった村や町はひどい惨殺にあっていると聞くけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've heard that in other regions, villages and towns under demon army control suffer terrible massacres.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらではそんな話はあまり聞かない、それども沢山殺されているけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, we don't hear much of that, though many are still killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンはもしかして１番マシなのかも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe Tsoton is the 'least bad' of them all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、支配化の地域では試験などをして優秀な人達が魔軍に連れ去られていると聞くわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, I've heard that in controlled areas, talented people are taken by the demon army through experiments and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいたいそれが２割くらいの人数らしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems that's about 20% of the population.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の頭脳として中に人間を飼っているからそれようかなと思ったがあまりにも多い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it might be because the demon general keeps humans inside as brains, but that's too many.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝になった・・が、暗い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Morning came... but it's dark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 光蝕-コウショク-
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —Koushoku (Light Eclipse)—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １５日の木曜、友引の日が重なった時に起こる不思議な現象
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A mysterious phenomenon that occurs when Thursday the 15th coincides with Tomobiki day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝になっても日が昇らず、真っ暗のまま。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though it's morning, the sun doesn't rise and it remains pitch dark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてついには星の光も消えて完全な暗闇になる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eventually, even starlight disappears, plunging everything into complete darkness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼頃には元に戻るのだが、よく分からない不思議な日です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By around noon, things return to normal, but it's a mysterious day that no one fully understands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが説明、ランスも光蝕自体は知っているので、そうか今日なのかという感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone explains it; Rance knows about the Light Eclipse itself and thinks, 'So it's today, huh'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう日ですから、魔軍も動かないと思います。動くとしても昼からですし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because it's such a day, I don't think the demon army will move. Even if they do, it'll be from noon on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出発を遅らせませんか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we delay our departure?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、これは面白い、むしろチャンス、いこう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, this is interesting—rather a chance. Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図で大将軍ツォトンがいると思われる場所を確認、魔軍エリアに適当に出して下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Check on the map the locations where General Tsoton is believed to be. Please place us appropriately in the demon army area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナガールモール周辺
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Around Nagaar Mall

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スリミド周辺
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Around Surimido

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イタリア周辺
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Around Italia

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このどこかと思われます、どうしますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's thought to be one of these. What will you do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Select

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ナガールモール周辺に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Head to the area around Nagaar Mall

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　スリミド周辺に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Head to the area around Surimido

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　イタリア周辺に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Head to the area around Italia

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜／星空
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Night / starry sky

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的地についたランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance arrived at the destination.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスが私も・・と出て行こうとするが、止めます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anise tries to say "Me too..." and go out, but I stop her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は我々が押しています、戦場では魔軍より我が軍の方が多い地域もあります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have the upper hand now; there are even areas on the battlefield where our forces outnumber the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが何か？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So what if that's the case?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですから、あなたは出せないのです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why you cannot be sent out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくわかりません。じゃ、カレー作ってきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't quite understand. Well then, I'll go make some curry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさんが魔人を倒してくれたおかげである程度、均衡は保てたとはいえ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to you, Rance, defeating the demon lord, we've been able to maintain some balance, at least to a degree.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決め手にかけますね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we're still lacking a decisive edge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス全土をすぐ取り戻したい気持ちは分かりますが、慎重に戦いましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand the desire to reclaim all of Zeth immediately, but let's fight carefully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いずれチャンスは来ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The opportunity will come eventually.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス首都、ラグナロックアーク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth Capital, Ragnarock Arc.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが魔人討伐隊を率いて現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance appeared leading the demon extermination squad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックと会話、元気していたかーしん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Talking with Magic, "How have you been?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡単な状況説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A brief explanation of the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサ、ガルティアは倒したが、まだ魔物大将軍ツォトン他の魔軍がいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Medusa and Galtia have been defeated, but the demon general Tsoton and other demon forces still remain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都を奪いかえす事は出来たが、まだ予断を許さない状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although we've been able to reclaim the capital, the situation is still precarious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この魔物大将軍ツォトンさえ倒せば、この方面の魔軍は崩壊する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we can just defeat this demon general Tsoton, the demon army in this area will collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか倒したいのだすが、ツォトンの場所が分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want to defeat him somehow, but we don't know Tsoton's location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後方で隠れている訳でなく、最前線に出てくる事も多いが常に移動しているので掴みきれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He doesn't hide in the rear, often appearing on the front lines, but he is constantly moving, so we can't pin him down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、３カ所ほど候補地が判明しているが・・　地図でその場所を見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, three possible locations have been identified... Showing those places on the map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのどれかかもしれないが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might be any one of those...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、せっかく来たのだし、俺様が退治してやろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, since I've come all this way, I'll take care of him myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無事に退治して戻って来たら、魔法使いの可愛い娘を４．５人処女頼む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I return safely after defeating him, I'll want 4 or 5 cute virgin sorceress girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにいっているのよー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you saying—!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは、今夜は・・お前だとマジックをひっぱって部屋に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha, tonight... it's you! He grabs Magic and drags her into the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞夜へ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > To night

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 客室、夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guest room, night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックとエッチした後、まったり中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Relaxing after having sex with Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ところでゼスに来ている敵の総大将・・えーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, the enemy's supreme commander here in Zeth... um...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ツォトンのゼス側が知る情報
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information known by Zeth about the demon general Tsoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たまに前線に現れる、無茶苦茶強い。魔法耐性が高い模様
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He occasionally appears on the front lines and is ridiculously strong. He seems to have high magic resistance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アニスの黒色を受けて生きていた、ダメージは受けていたので倒せない事はない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He survived Anise's 'Blackness,' and although he took damage, he's not invincible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の地域では魔軍の支配地になった村や町はひどい惨殺にあっていると聞くけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've heard that in other regions, villages and towns under demon army control suffer terrible massacres.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらではそんな話はあまり聞かない、それども沢山殺されているけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, we don't hear much of that, though many are still killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンはもしかして１番マシなのかも・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe Tsoton is the 'least bad' of them all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、支配化の地域では試験などをして優秀な人達が魔軍に連れ去られていると聞くわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, I've heard that in controlled areas, talented people are taken by the demon army through experiments and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいたいそれが２割くらいの人数らしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems that's about 20% of the population.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の頭脳として中に人間を飼っているからそれようかなと思ったがあまりにも多い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it might be because the demon general keeps humans inside as brains, but that's too many.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふーん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝になった・・が、暗い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Morning came... but it's dark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設定
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 光蝕-コウショク-
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —Koushoku (Light Eclipse)—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １５日の木曜、友引の日が重なった時に起こる不思議な現象
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A mysterious phenomenon that occurs when Thursday the 15th coincides with Tomobiki day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝になっても日が昇らず、真っ暗のまま。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though it's morning, the sun doesn't rise and it remains pitch dark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてついには星の光も消えて完全な暗闇になる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eventually, even starlight disappears, plunging everything into complete darkness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼頃には元に戻るのだが、よく分からない不思議な日です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By around noon, things return to normal, but it's a mysterious day that no one fully understands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが説明、ランスも光蝕自体は知っているので、そうか今日なのかという感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone explains it; Rance knows about the Light Eclipse itself and thinks, 'So it's today, huh'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういう日ですから、魔軍も動かないと思います。動くとしても昼からですし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because it's such a day, I don't think the demon army will move. Even if they do, it'll be from noon on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出発を遅らせませんか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we delay our departure?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、これは面白い、むしろチャンス、いこう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, this is interesting—rather a chance. Let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図で大将軍ツォトンがいると思われる場所を確認、魔軍エリアに適当に出して下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Check on the map the locations where General Tsoton is believed to be. Please place us appropriately in the demon army area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナガールモール周辺
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Around Nagaar Mall

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スリミド周辺
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Around Surimido

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イタリア周辺
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Around Italia

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このどこかと思われます、どうしますか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's thought to be one of these. What will you do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Select

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ナガールモール周辺に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Head to the area around Nagaar Mall

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　スリミド周辺に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Head to the area around Surimido

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　イタリア周辺に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Head to the area around Italia

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜／星空
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Night / starry sky

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目的地についたランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance arrived at the destination.
